review: It's cheap and convenient, but it's also glitchy.  Works for about two weeks then I have to unplug it to force a reboot.  Also every couple days it loses connection and you have to start the program over (okay for most apps but sucks for sling TV).  This being said it's 40$ and works most of the time.  It turns an old TV into a smart TV, but I prefer my actual smart TV or my Xbox.
